name: unbought
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unbought goods have not been bought: Her books remained unbought on the shelves. At the end of the month, any unbought stock is sold at a discount.
An unbought politician is not influenced by rich people who have given money to his or her party: She is still the spunky unbought politican she ever was.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is still quite a lot of unbought stock.Thousands of magazines went unbought.She ran for president under the slogan "Unbought and Unbossed".
